statement.name: INSERT_SMABKO
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMABKO(NROBKO, CODBKO, NOMBKO, NPQBKO, DIRBKO, TELBKO, FAXBKO, PRSBKO, CODPQK, OBSBKO, CRDBKO, WWWBKO, EMLBKO, SQLBKR) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMABKO
statement.desc: Actualizar registro de la tabla bancos
statement.sql: UPDATE SMABKO SET NOMBKO = ?, NPQBKO = ?, DIRBKO = ?, TELBKO = ?, FAXBKO = ?, PRSBKO = ?, CRDBKO = ?, WWWBKO = ?, EMLBKO = ? WHERE NROBKO = ?

statement.name: DELETE_SMABKO
statement.desc: Eliminar registro de la tabla bancos
